name: PUMP IT UP
summary: A revolution of PUMP begins with distinctive 5 cross direction footsteps. The first version of PUMP IT UP, the PUMP IT UP 1ST DANCE FLOOR is surrounded with the most popular songs within the late 90’s generation, it instantly grabbed a lot of people’s attention and created a huge PUMP sensation in Korea.
